text: Arthralgia 90% Behavioral abnormality 90% Encephalitis 90% Lymphadenopathy 90% Migraine 90% Recurrent pharyngitis 90% Weight loss 90% Abdominal pain 7.5% Arthritis 7.5% Hepatomegaly 7.5% Malabsorption 7.5% Nausea and vomiting 7.5% Splenomegaly 7.5% The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition. Much of this information comes from Orphanet, a European rare disease database. The frequency of a sign or symptom is usually listed as
